scripts.babel: babel lib -d dist/lib && babel test -d dist/test
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run babel
scripts.coverage: npm run build && istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha "dist/test/**/*.spec.js" --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run mocha
